typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ecEventGkey as long,
		yardGkey as string,
		YardID as string,
		FcyID as string,
		cheKind as string,
		cheName as string,
		cheID as long,
		EcEventTime as timestamp,
		type as short,
		subType as short,
		typeDescription as string,
		fromCheIdName as string,
		ToCheIdName as string,
		unitIdName as string,
		powName as string,
		poolName as string,
		workQueue as string,
		travelDistance as short,
		moveKind as string,
		isTwinMove as string,
		startDistance as short,
		workAssignmentId as double,
		unitReference as string,
		tranId as string,
		locType as string,
		locId as string,
		locSlot as string,
		opsPosId as string,
		unladenLoctype as string,
		unladenLocid as string,
		unladenLocSlot as string,
		ladenLoctype as string,
		ladenLocid as string,
		ladenLocSlot as string,
		lastEstMoveTime as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'plipdeco',
	folderPath: 'silver/ecevents') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey,
		YardID,
		FcyID,
		cheKind,
		CHE_Name = cheName,
		CHE_ID = cheID,
		TimeStamp = EcEventTime,
		eventType = type,
		eventSubType = subType,
		eventTypeDescription = typeDescription,
		unit = unitIdName,
		pow = powName,
		pool = poolName,
		workQueue,
		moveKind,
		locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = ladenLocSlot,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select
select filter(cheKind=='RTG' && eventTypeDescription=='CMPL') ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		MoveCount = iif(moveKind=='YARD',iif(left(locSlot,5)==left(laden_LocSlot,5),2,1),1),
		Block = left(locSlot,3),
		Hour = toString(TimeStamp, 'HH'),
		WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
select filter((eventTypeDescription == 'LGOF' || eventTypeDescription == 'LGON') && cheKind == 'RTG') ~> Filter5
Filter5 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3 derive(WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')))),
		Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		Block = left(locSlot,3)) ~> DerivedColumn3
Sort1 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true),
	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),
		TimeStamp_PREV = lag(TimeStamp),
		TimeStamp_NXT = lead(TimeStamp),
		eventTypeDescription_PREV = lag(eventTypeDescription),
		eventTypeDescription_NXT = lead(eventTypeDescription)) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(LGOF = case(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',case(eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGOF',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT),eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGON',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT-seconds(1)))),(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV)),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON', ShiftEndTime)),
		LGON = case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',TimeStamp),
		WorkTime = toDouble((case(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',case(eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGOF',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT),eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGON',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT-seconds(1)))),(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV)),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON', ShiftEndTime))-case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',TimeStamp))/3600000)) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 sort(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true)) ~> Sort1
Filter6 sort(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true)) ~> Sort2
Sort2 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true),
	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),
		TimeStamp_PREV = lag(TimeStamp),
		TimeStamp_NXT = lead(TimeStamp),
		locSlot_PREV = lag(locSlot),
		locSlot_NXT = lead(locSlot),
		ecEventGkey_PREV = lag(ecEventGkey),
		ecEventGkey_NXT = lead(ecEventGkey),
		ShiftDate_PREV = lag(ShiftDate),
		ShiftDate_NXT = lead(ShiftDate),
		LGON_PREV = lag(LGON),
		LGON_NXT = lead(LGON),
		LGOF_PREV = lag(LGOF),
		LGOF_NXT = lead(LGOF)) ~> Window2
DerivedColumn1, Filter7 join(Aggregate1@CHE_ID == Aggregate3@CHE_ID
	&& DerivedColumn1@ShiftStartTime == DerivedColumn3@ShiftStartTime
	&& DerivedColumn1@ShiftEndTime == DerivedColumn3@ShiftEndTime,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey = Aggregate1@ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey = Aggregate1@yardGkey,
		YardID = Aggregate1@YardID,
		FcyID = Aggregate1@FcyID,
		cheKind = Aggregate1@cheKind,
		CHE_Name = Aggregate1@CHE_Name,
		CHE_ID = Aggregate1@CHE_ID,
		TimeStamp = Aggregate1@TimeStamp,
		eventType = Aggregate1@eventType,
		eventSubType = Aggregate1@eventSubType,
		eventTypeDescription = Aggregate1@eventTypeDescription,
		unit = Aggregate1@unit,
		pow = Aggregate1@pow,
		pool = Aggregate1@pool,
		workQueue = Aggregate1@workQueue,
		moveKind = Aggregate1@moveKind,
		locSlot = Aggregate1@locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot = Aggregate1@unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = Aggregate1@laden_LocSlot,
		Year = Aggregate1@Year,
		Month = Aggregate1@Month,
		Week = Aggregate1@Week,
		Date = DerivedColumn1@Date,
		Time = DerivedColumn1@Time,
		ShiftStartTime = DerivedColumn1@ShiftStartTime,
		ShiftEndTime = DerivedColumn1@ShiftEndTime,
		Shift = DerivedColumn1@Shift,
		ShiftDate = DerivedColumn1@ShiftDate,
		MoveCount,
		Block = DerivedColumn1@Block,
		Hour,
		WeekofYear = DerivedColumn1@WeekofYear,
		{ecEventGkey.1} = Aggregate3@ecEventGkey,
		{ShiftDate.1} = DerivedColumn3@ShiftDate,
		LGOF,
		LGON,
		WorkTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(Valid = iif(TimeStamp>=LGON && TimeStamp<=LGOF,1,0)) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 filter(Valid==1) ~> Filter6
Window2 derive(FirstMove = case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp),
		LastMove = case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp),
		IdleTimeFL = case(isNull(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp))==false(),(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp)-LGON)/3600000,isNull(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp))==false(),(LGOF-case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp))/3600000),
		RTGIdleTime = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT && ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif((TimeStamp_NXT-TimeStamp)<0,0.0,toFloat((TimeStamp_NXT-TimeStamp)/3600000)),0.0),
		BayChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)==left(locSlot_NXT,3),iif(left(locSlot,5)!=left(locSlot_NXT,5),1,0),0),0),0),0),
		BayChangeCount = iif(isNull(locSlot_NXT)==true(),0,iif(iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)==left(locSlot_NXT,3),iif(left(locSlot,5)!=left(locSlot_NXT,5),1,0),0),0),0),0)==1,
iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))>toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)),iif( 
toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))+1),
(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))), 
iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))+1),
(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))))
,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,iif(
    toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))+1) 
,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))) 
,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))+1) 
,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))))),0)),
		BlockChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)!=left(locSlot_NXT,3),1,0),0),0),0),
		LaneChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,2)!=left(locSlot_NXT,2),1,0),0),0),0)) ~> DerivedColumn6
DerivedColumn4 filter(isNull(WorkTime)==false()) ~> Filter7
DerivedColumn6 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Filter7 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'plipdeco',
	folderPath: 'gold/rtg_ecevents',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ecEventGkey'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey,
		YardID,
		FcyID,
		cheKind,
		CHE_Name,
		CHE_ID,
		TimeStamp,
		eventType,
		eventSubType,
		eventTypeDescription,
		unit,
		pow,
		pool,
		workQueue,
		moveKind,
		locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week,
		Date,
		Time,
		ShiftStartTime,
		ShiftEndTime,
		Shift,
		ShiftDate,
		MoveCount,
		Block,
		Hour,
		WeekofYear,
		{ecEventGkey.1},
		{ShiftDate.1},
		LGOF,
		LGON,
		WorkTime,
		Valid,
		CHE_ID_PREV,
		CHE_ID_NXT,
		TimeStamp_PREV,
		TimeStamp_NXT,
		locSlot_PREV,
		locSlot_NXT,
		ecEventGkey_PREV,
		ecEventGkey_NXT,
		ShiftDate_PREV,
		ShiftDate_NXT,
		LGON_PREV,
		LGON_NXT,
		LGOF_PREV,
		LGOF_NXT,
		FirstMove,
		LastMove,
		IdleTimeFL,
		RTGIdleTime,
		BayChangeInstance,
		BayChangeCount,
		BlockChangeInstance,
		LaneChangeInstance
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> RTG
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ecEventGkey as long,
		yardGkey as string,
		YardID as string,
		FcyID as string,
		cheKind as string,
		CHE_Name as string,
		CHE_ID as long,
		TimeStamp as timestamp,
		eventType as string,
		eventSubType as string,
		eventTypeDescription as string,
		unit as string,
		pow as string,
		pool as string,
		workQueue as string,
		moveKind as string,
		locSlot as string,
		unladenLocSlot as string,
		laden_LocSlot as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer,
		WeekofYear as integer,
		Date as date,
		Time as string,
		ShiftStartTime as timestamp,
		ShiftEndTime as timestamp,
		Shift as integer,
		ShiftDate as date,
		Block as string,
		CHE_ID_PREV as long,
		CHE_ID_NXT as long,
		TimeStamp_PREV as timestamp,
		TimeStamp_NXT as timestamp,
		eventTypeDescription_PREV as string,
		eventTypeDescription_NXT as string,
		LGOF as timestamp,
		LGON as timestamp,
		WorkTime as double
	),
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'plipdeco',
	folderPath: 'gold/rtg_workhours',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ecEventGkey'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey,
		YardID,
		FcyID,
		cheKind,
		CHE_Name,
		CHE_ID,
		TimeStamp,
		eventType,
		eventSubType,
		eventTypeDescription,
		unit,
		pow,
		pool,
		workQueue,
		moveKind,
		locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week,
		WeekofYear,
		Date,
		Time,
		ShiftStartTime,
		ShiftEndTime,
		Shift,
		ShiftDate,
		Block,
		CHE_ID_PREV,
		CHE_ID_NXT,
		TimeStamp_PREV,
		TimeStamp_NXT,
		eventTypeDescription_PREV,
		eventTypeDescription_NXT,
		LGOF,
		LGON,
		WorkTime
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> workhours
